Pre-exposure Prophylaxis PrEP use daily medication prevent HIV infection . In order PrEP work pill must take , adherence important part PrEP . This mean good accurate assessment PrEP adherence self-reports need order PrEP achieve wide-spread use . This longitudinal pilot sub-study ATN 110 ATN 113 ( Project PrEPare - An Open Label Demonstration Project Phase II Safety Study Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis Use Among Young Men Who Have Sex With Men ( YMSM ) United States ) aim assess structural ( physical setting ) partnership factor affect adherence YMSM PrEP .
